hhDesc: Tucked away within the lush embrace of tall conifers, Košuta offers a unique fusion of modern ambience and natural details. Immerse your events in the unparalleled beauty of this space, where luxury meets the tranquility of nature
hhText1: Restaurant Košuta organizes business lunches, celebrations, weddings and luxury gatherings.
hhText2: The building is equipped with central air conditioning and ventilation.
hhText3: Menus of choice, starting from 18 EUR per person.
hhText4: Prices are subject to change and guests' wishes.
